# GitHub Copilot Instructions

**Read the AGENTS.md file in the repository root and follow it rigidly.**

All AI agents working on this codebase must:
1. Read and understand `/AGENTS.md` completely before starting any work
2. Follow all guidelines, principles, and standards outlined in AGENTS.md
3. Refer to the documentation structure defined in AGENTS.md
4. Adhere to the testing and quality standards specified

The AGENTS.md file contains essential information about:
- Core development principles
- Project structure and architecture
- Documentation organization
- Testing requirements
- Quality standards
- Common workflows

Do not deviate from the guidelines in AGENTS.md without explicit approval.
